Package game.dinosaur.behaviours

Class BreedingBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.dinosaur.behaviours.Behaviour
game.dinosaur.behaviours.BreedingBehaviour
public class BreedingBehaviour
extends Behaviour
A class that figures out the distance to a mate and perform the breeding action as well as the layEggAction when dinosaur is pregnant
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Suchit Krishna

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int breedCounter
    Counter to check how long dinsosaur has been pregnant for

    • getAction

      public Action getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      The breeding action method that directs dino to layeggaction or moves dinosaur closer to the mate and finally makes them breed
      Specified by:
      getAction in class Behaviour
      Parameters:
      actor - actor to perform action
      map - current game map
      Returns:
      follow partner action if not near and wander behavior if cannot be followed
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)

    • findMate

      public Location findMate​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      This method finds the location of the partner closest to the actor
      Parameters:
      actor - actor to perform action
      map - current game map
      Returns:
      location of the ideal mate

    • layEggAction

      public Action layEggAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      the layeggaction that lays and egg based on the breeding counter and type of dinosaur
      Parameters:
      actor - actor to perform action
      map - current game map
      Returns:
      DropItemAction if dino can lay egg or find food otherwise

    • findLayLocation

      public Location findLayLocation​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      This method finds the location of the type of ground that a dinosaur can lay its eggs in
      Parameters:
      actor - actor to perform action
      map - current game map
      Returns:
      idealLocation to lay an egg on
